title: OCE log issue RADS Erros
body: I dont know why i cant log in my LOL, it alwats shows that the RADS Erros. If somebody knows how to solve it, plz tell me. Thx

replies.body: Ya we have to play the waiting game.

This error is happening for many people atm. Some have found that [manually setting their DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4) fixes it.

I suggest waiting it out for when Riot notices it and fixes it. If you'd like to try other stuff in the meantime, just ask.

Best of luck.
